bwwExcerpt: When Birbiglia runs down a numbered list of his arguments against having kids, most revolve around his own insecurities and suspected shortcomings as a dad. "If we're being honest with ourselves, kids hold us back," he says, before edging into more charged waters. "My best example of this is the history of women."
